goal.en: Reading most important academic articles about modern Taiwan history and discourse the issues, wish all the graduate students can judge the colonial history in identifiable and objective views. Besides, it is the aim to get the ability of researching and writing history academic paper.
goal.ch: 就近代台灣史上重要課題加以論述，並針對各相關學術論著作一檢視與討論，期使閱聽者能以實證與客觀立場出發，重新看待近代台灣史實並具備該領域之學術研究能力。
